Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.model

Class Map

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.model.Map
public class Map extends Object
This is a map model class which stores all the countries and continents of the map. It handles operations like adding and removing continents, countries and their neighbors. It also handles 'savemap' and 'loadmap' functionalities as well as validates that each all continents and the map a
Author:
Devansh, Smridhi, Meshva

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This function empties every data structure when called and initialises the country and continent 0.

    • addContinent

      public void addContinent(String p_ContinentName, int p_ContinentValue) throws Exception
      This method handles continent input and adds the continent to the list of the list of continents object.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - this is the name of the continent
      p_ContinentValue - this is the value of the continent
      Throws:
      Exception - it throws an exception if the continent is already present in the map

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_ContinentName) throws Exception
      This method removes a continent, all the countries in that continent along cuts the ties of those countries with their neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - this is the name of the continent
      Throws:
      Exception - it throws an exception if the continent does not exist

    • continentAlreadyExist

      public boolean continentAlreadyExist(String p_ContinentName)
      This is a method to check whether the continent exists in the map or not
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - this is the name of the continent
      Returns:
      'true' if the continent exists, otherwise 'false'

    • addCountries

      public void addCountries(String p_CountryName, String p_ContinentName) throws Exception
      This method handles countries input and adds the countries to the list of the list of countries object
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - this is the name of the country
      p_ContinentName - this is the name of the continent where the country is located
      Throws:
      Exception - throws an exception if the country already exists or the given continent does not exist

    • countryAlreadyExist

      public boolean countryAlreadyExist(String p_CountryName)
      This is a method to check whether the country exists in the map or not
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - this is the name of the country
      Returns:
      'true' if the country exists, otherwise 'false'

    • addCountryNeighbour

      public void addCountryNeighbour(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighborName) throws Exception
      This is a method to establish a neighboring connection between two countries
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - this is the name of the first country
      p_NeighborName - this is the name of the country to be added as a neighbor
      Throws:
      Exception - if the country name is wrong

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry(String p_CountryName) throws Exception
      This method is used to remove a country and cut its ties with the neighbors
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - it is the name of the country to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - if the country does not exist on the map

    • removeNeighbor

      public void removeNeighbor(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighborName, boolean p_Both) throws Exception
      IThis method is used to remove country's neighbor
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - this is the name of the country
      p_NeighborName - this is the name of its neighbor country
      p_Both - if 'true', it removes the connection from both the countries else, only removes the connection from the country itself
      Throws:
      Exception - throws an exception if the country or its neighbor does not exist

      public void saveFile(String p_FileName) throws Exception
      This method saves the map file
      Parameters:
      p_FileName - this is the map file name
      Throws:
      Exception - throws exception if the map is not valid

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      p_FileName - the file name to be loaded
      Throws:
      Exception - if the file name does not exist or if it is corrupted

    • checkCountriesInsideContinentIsConnected

      public boolean checkCountriesInsideContinentIsConnected() throws Exception
      This method checks that each continent is a connected component or not
      Returns:
      'true' if it is a connected component, else 'false'
      Throws:
      Exception - if the continent does not have any country

    • checkCountriesIsConnected

      public boolean checkCountriesIsConnected(ArrayList<Country> p_Countries)
      This method checks the countries present within a continent is a connected graph or not
      Parameters:
      p_Countries - this is a list of countries present in the continent
      Returns:
      'true' if it is a connected component, else 'false'

    • checkWholeMapIsConnectedSubGraph

      public boolean checkWholeMapIsConnectedSubGraph()
      This method checks the whole map is a connected graph or not
      Returns:
      'true if is connected, else 'false'

    • DFS

      public void DFS(int pStartNode, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> p_Visited, HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Integer>> p_AdjList)
      This is a utility method to perform DFS traversal on map
      Parameters:
      pStartNode - this is the starting node
      p_Visited - this is the list of visited node
      p_AdjList - this is the adjacency list of the continent

      This is a utility method to perform DFS traversal on map
      Parameters:
      pStartNode - this is the starting node
      p_Visited - this is the list of visited node

      public void showMap()
